full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,LHA CHEN DGE BSNYEN SKYES RIS CHEN PO 'JIGS MED DPA' PO TA YAN TE RI KHE ZHES GRAGS PA LA MCHOD GTOR 'BUL TSUL 'DOD DGU'I CHAR 'BEBS YID BZHIN DBANG RGYAL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @020B ZHES LHA CHEN DGE SNYEN SKYES RIS CHEN PO 'JIGS MED DPA' PO TA YAN TE RI KHE ZHES GRAGS PA LA MCHOD GTOR 'BUL TSUL 'DOD DGU'I CHAR 'BEBS YID BZHIN DBANG RGYAL ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, GSO RIG PA LA SOGS PA'I CHOS KYI MIG PHYE BA'I RIGS RUS PHUN SUM TSOGS PA DANG LDAN PA'I HAL HA SAS 'ANG NO YON NU AAS MAG GI CHED SHOG GI ,DGE TSUL DGE BSGOS SU MA TI SHRI GA NA ZHES BYA BAS BKRA SHIS KHA BTAGS DANG BCAS PA MI PHYED PA'I DAD PAS 'BUL NAS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG PADMA RGYAL PO RTZAL MING CAN GYIS BZANG PO GSUM PA'I NYIN LA SUG BRIS BGYIS TE SBYAR BA'O, ,YI GE PA NI SER BYES MKHAS MAD GRVA TSAN GYI GNYER PA DGE TSUL NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN NO,
author_simple: PADMA RGYAL PO RTZAL MING CAN,
